title: Tourism powers Antigua and Barbuda’s economic surge
description:
WESTERN BUREAU:

Antigua and Barbuda is riding a wave of exceptional tourism growth, emerging as one of the fastest-growing service-based economies in the Caribbean and a standout success story in the region’s post-pandemic recovery.

Speaking at the 43rd staging of the Caribbean Travel Marketplace,...

description:
Antigua and Barbuda Prime Minister Gaston Alphonso Browne delivers a national statement during the high level segment on day three of the UNFCCC COP29 Climate Conference at Baku Stadium on Nov. 13, 2024 in Baku, Azerbaijan.
